BR_text.BRsummary: Displacy's EntityRenderer not breaking line after last entity
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 SAMPLE_TEXT = '''First line
 Second line, with ent
 Third line
 Fourth line
 '''
 nlp = English()
 doc = nlp(SAMPLE_TEXT)
 doc.ents = [Span(doc, 7, 8, label='test')]
 html = displacy.render(doc, style='ent')
 <denchmark-h:h3>Results</denchmark-h>

 <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
 
 
 spaCy version: 2.3.2
 Platform: Darwin-19.3.0-x86_64-i386-64bit
 Python version: 3.7.4
